basics.name: Engineering Intern
basics.label: Engineering Intern
basics.summary: Candidate with a fifteen months experience in production supervising and manufacturing seeking opportunity in field of Quality, Supply Chain and Manufacturing

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Research and Development of new product, Rubber Screen Panels used in mining industries Manufacturing and Production of new product using Injection Molding technique Scheduling and Planning operations Implementation of strategic planning and control Application of Lean manufacturing Efficient handling Injection Molding machine Followed ISO 9001
highlights: Implementing quality assurance tools like method of steepest ascent, response surface modelling, statistical process control, process capability analysis to achieve the continuous production of consistent output 9V batteries

work.name: Community Beer Works
work.summary: Applied six sigma tools DMAIC to the transaction process in an organization Reviewed and applied 5S, cause and effect diagram, histogram, Pareto Chart, Value Stream Mapping etc.
highlights: Planned, studied and analyzed the Supply Chain of AMUL Diary

work.name: Orientation: National Organic Chemicals of India Limited (NOCIL) Rubber Chemical Division
work.summary: Supervised production unit known as CBS (n-cyclohexylamine 2- benzothiozole sulpanamide which produced chemical which is further used as accelerator in production of tires by clients such as MRF ( Madras Rubber Factory), Monsento (company in brazil) Handled distillation columns, pressure vessels and valves controlled by PLC and DCS Efficiently maintained distillation columns without any single event of mishandling Followed hazardous operability process (HAZOP) Implementation of failure mode effective analysis (FMEA).

education.institution: University at Buffalo, The State University of New York

projects.name: 9 Volt battery production
projects.description: Manufacturing a 9 Volt battery with minimum process variability and cost of production
